name: part_004
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】最初で最後の #かなけん3DLIVE !!【天音かなた、沙花叉クロヱ、AZKi  ⧸ ホロライブ】 [IhJW-YPJ-z0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: The trio concludes their performance of the previous song.
Performance of 'Bibideba' by AZKi, Amane Kanata, and Sakamata Chloe.
Performance of 'Northern Cross' by AZKi, Amane Kanata, and Sakamata Chloe.

subtitles.original: あの雲も越えて行く
subtitles.english: Beyond those clouds we go

subtitles.original: 遠くまだ遠くまで
subtitles.english: Farther, still farther away

subtitles.original: ビビデバ
subtitles.english: Bibideba

subtitles.original: Come on, my days もう散々ね
subtitles.english: Come on, my days, it's been terrible

subtitles.original: 奇跡願ってるだけの人生
subtitles.english: A life of just wishing for miracles

subtitles.original: Watch me, dut-dut-dut-ta-hit you
subtitles.english: Watch me, dut-dut-dut-ta-hit you

subtitles.original: 虜にしましょう Magic
subtitles.english: Let me captivate you with magic

subtitles.original: I wanna be free だって I wanna be free
subtitles.english: I wanna be free, because I wanna be free

subtitles.original: ちょっとはにかんで Step out
subtitles.english: Bashfully stepping out

subtitles.original: エトセトラ 宇宙まで
subtitles.english: And so on, to the ends of space

subtitles.original: 秒針は音を立てて
subtitles.english: The second hand makes its sound

subtitles.original: 夜を急かす魔物のよう
subtitles.english: Like a monster rushing the night

subtitles.original: 人生は一瞬にして 解ける魔法
subtitles.english: Life is a magic spell that breaks in an instant

subtitles.original: それならば 駆け抜けて 思い通り
subtitles.english: If that's the case, run through it just as you wish

subtitles.original: お邪魔な鎖飛び乗って Driving
subtitles.english: Jumping onto those meddling chains, driving

subtitles.original: 私は大変身 Make up
subtitles.english: I'm undergoing a major transformation, make up

subtitles.original: 我がままの Money money 煌めきに Change
subtitles.english: Selfish money, money, changing into a sparkle

subtitles.original: しゃらくな街で Dancing
subtitles.english: Dancing in this cheeky city

subtitles.original: さよなら Goodbye Let it go
subtitles.english: Say goodbye, goodbye, let it go

subtitles.original: いつかは喝采 Crowd the audience
subtitles.english: Someday, cheers will fill the crowd

subtitles.original: 皆々ご唱和あれ
subtitles.english: Everyone, sing along with me

subtitles.original: Bibide-babide-boo-wa! Bibide-babide-boo-wa! Yeah!
subtitles.english: Bibide-babide-boo-wa! Bibide-babide-boo-wa! Yeah!

subtitles.original: 後悔したってしょうがないから
subtitles.english: There's no point in regretting it

subtitles.original: シューズ辿る Tonight
subtitles.english: Following my shoes tonight

subtitles.original: Bibide-babide-boo-wa! Bibide-babide-boo-wa! Yeah!
subtitles.english: Bibide-babide-boo-wa! Bibide-babide-boo-wa! Yeah!

subtitles.original: 今夜にアスナロはないならば
subtitles.english: If there's no "tomorrow" for tonight

subtitles.original: 自由取ったもん勝ちでしょ
subtitles.english: Then winning is all about taking your freedom

subtitles.original: Dut-dut-da-down Slide a-di-ho
subtitles.english: Dut-dut-da-down Slide a-di-ho

subtitles.original: どんな問題も会話ひとつ
subtitles.english: Every problem is just one conversation away

subtitles.original: 拍手も正解も間違いも
subtitles.english: The applause, the right answers, the mistakes too

subtitles.original: 愛す本当の私の理想
subtitles.english: I'll love them all, my true ideal

subtitles.original: あの高い世界は限界の気配がして
subtitles.english: That high world feels like it's reaching its limit

subtitles.original: おどおど安心じゃ心配
subtitles.english: Just being timidly safe makes me worried

subtitles.original: 今すぐ Jumping Jumping Now!
subtitles.english: Now, jumping, jumping, now!

subtitles.original: チキチキバンバン チキバンバン
subtitles.english: Chiki chiki ban ban, chiki ban ban

subtitles.original: 逆々ニキニキ 回抱く日々に
subtitles.english: Back and forth, side by side, in days of recovery

subtitles.original: ギリギリ爆発 君だって
subtitles.english: On the verge of exploding, even you

subtitles.original: 今 発散してしまおうか
subtitles.english: Shall we let it all out right now?

subtitles.original: まだまだ Bibide-babide-boo-wa!
subtitles.english: More and more, Bibide-babide-boo-wa!

subtitles.original: 1発じゃ足りないわ
subtitles.english: One shot isn't enough

subtitles.original: ついに導き出した 君にアンサー
subtitles.english: Finally I've found it, the answer for you

subtitles.original: 灰になるまで踊ってよ
subtitles.english: Dance until we turn to ash

subtitles.original: お邪魔な鎖飛び乗って Driving
subtitles.english: Jumping onto those meddling chains, driving

subtitles.original: 私は大変身 Make up
subtitles.english: I'm undergoing a major transformation, make up

subtitles.original: 我がままの Money money 煌めきに Change
subtitles.english: Selfish money, money, changing into a sparkle

subtitles.original: しゃらくな街で Dancing
subtitles.english: Dancing in this cheeky city

subtitles.original: さよなら Goodbye Let it go
subtitles.english: Say goodbye, goodbye, let it go

subtitles.original: いつかは喝采 Crowd the audience
subtitles.english: Someday, cheers will fill the crowd

subtitles.original: 皆々ご唱和あれ
subtitles.english: Everyone, sing along with me

subtitles.original: Bibide-babide-boo-wa! Bibide-babide-boo-wa! Yeah!
subtitles.english: Bibide-babide-boo-wa! Bibide-babide-boo-wa! Yeah!

subtitles.original: 後悔したってしょうがないから
subtitles.english: There's no point in regretting it

subtitles.original: シューズ辿る Tonight
subtitles.english: Following my shoes tonight

subtitles.original: Bibide-babide-boo-wa! Bibide-babide-boo-wa! Yeah!
subtitles.english: Bibide-babide-boo-wa! Bibide-babide-boo-wa! Yeah!

subtitles.original: 今夜にアスナロはないならば
subtitles.english: If there's no "tomorrow" for tonight

subtitles.original: 自由取ったもん勝ちでしょ
subtitles.english: Then winning is all about taking your freedom

subtitles.original: ノーザンクロス
subtitles.english: Northern Cross

subtitles.original: 旅の始まりは もう思い出せない
subtitles.english: I can no longer remember the start of the journey

subtitles.original: 気づいたら ここにいた
subtitles.english: Before I knew it, I was here

subtitles.original: 季節が破けて 見果てぬ先が
subtitles.english: The seasons have torn open, and the endless future...

subtitles.original: 閃光 感じる瞳が 迷子になる
subtitles.english: ...makes my eyes that feel the flash get lost

subtitles.original: たぶん失うのだ 命だけの思い
subtitles.english: Perhaps I will lose it, this feeling that is my very life

subtitles.original: 戦うように恋した
subtitles.english: I loved as if I were fighting

subtitles.original: ひたすらに夢を追った
subtitles.english: I chased my dreams single-mindedly

subtitles.original: その星より高かった
subtitles.english: It was higher than that star

subtitles.original: 君の空 飛びたかった
subtitles.english: I wanted to fly in your sky

subtitles.original: 誰か空虚の輪郭を そっとなでてくれないか
subtitles.english: Won't someone gently stroke the outline of the void?

subtitles.original: 胸の鼓動に蹴飛ばされて
subtitles.english: Kicked by the beating of my heart

subtitles.original: 転がり出た愛の言葉
subtitles.english: The words of love tumbled out

subtitles.original: だけど困ったな 答えがない
subtitles.english: But I'm in trouble, there's no answer

subtitles.original: 宿命に張り付けられた
subtitles.english: Pinned down by destiny

subtitles.original: 北極星が燃えてる
subtitles.english: The North Star is burning

subtitles.original: 君を拒否して 凍らせた
subtitles.english: I rejected you and froze you

subtitles.original: なのに 可憐に花を咲かす
subtitles.english: And yet, it blooms so gracefully

subtitles.original: 好きだったよ
subtitles.english: I loved you
